title: minerjones

content: LOT 1: 5x Alpen Coin Custom BuyerFunded 2021BF 108 1Bb69ZLv6R43N8kXfJCYXcg1zA7u3M73oHBF 109 113PgzXsUS3pRC58tKy2huGVfBnzzfLpM2BF 110 1cNcERMErW2yaZnt45WyYsHDEg5P57GkkBF 111 15h1gtbo8eFn9FmdEiHNPKZrjLEyB9dej9BF 112 1Ls2rXd8EwPsfDUTF4vkpWiiSSNdCrDuaZSTARTING BID: 0.0012BTC per coinLOT 2: 5x Alpen Coin Custom 2021 D.I.Y. KitSTARTING BID: 0.0006BTC per coin*Each Alpen Coin will come with appropriate  instruction card/hologram kit and/or COALOT 3: 4x Obolite BTC, ETH, Doge chipsBTCETHDogeDogeSTARTING BID: 0.0009BTC per coin**Each Lot will work on a LIFO system as seen in previous multi-lot multi-coin/chip auction**Winners will select coins/chips in order of winSTARTING BID PER LOT PER COIN/CHIP: SEE ABOVEBTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT PER COIN/CHIP: 0.0001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: DECEMBER 22nd, 2022, 13:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preference

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Lot 1: 5@ 0.0012Lot 2: 5@ 0.0006Quick question, is there a bitcoin-address list for the buyer funded Alpen coins?I did a quick check at their website but didn't find anything.And regarding the obolite chips, is it just the photo, or does the print look slightly grainy?

comments.author: owlcatz
comments.body: Quote from: Kryptowerk on December 18, 2022, 01:19:19 AMLot 1: 5@ 0.0012Lot 2: 5@ 0.0006Quick question, is there a bitcoin-address list for the buyer funded Alpen coins?I did a quick check at their website but didn't find anything.And regarding the obolite chips, is it just the photo, or does the print look slightly grainy?Here you can just type a serial number and get the public addy...  https://en.alpencoin.ch/public-keyThere are a few lists out on the forum as well. I guess someone with some time on their hands could script a scraper for all coin addys and balances, but no time myself...  https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2022902.msg49628632#msg49628632 etcedit - changed url for alpencoin to EN version from FR...

comments.author: Frank AlpenCoin

I guess someone with some time on their hands could script a scraper for all coin addys and balances, but no time myself...  https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2022902.msg49628632#msg49628632 etcedit - changed url for alpencoin to EN version from FR... Hi MJ,I plan to make a thread on the forum with all the addresses in case the site (alpencoin.ch) disappears or whatever. I haven't found the time yet. I'll do it at the beginning of 2023.
